translation.en: [Michael on radio] Oh, fucking hell.
Is he alright?
Daddy?!
Daddy!
[Michael] Land this plane immediately.
[Jack] It's been a really tough year
for so many people around the world,
and we had some really scary times as a family as well.
translation.zh: ‎我们家也经历了一些非常惊险的时刻

translation.en: But thankfully, things are now looking up.
translation.zh: ‎但值得庆幸的是 一切都在好转

translation.en: I've found lockdown really hard.
I'm a free spirit.
Caging
a peacock like this…
It was difficult.
Daddy, though, I think has loved lockdown.
Hilary?
Yes?
Can you bring me a glass of wine, please?
To be honest, I've actually rather enjoyed lockdown
because
I don't have to see people.
And I find, generally speaking,
I'm not that keen on people.

translation.en: No one's been allowed to hug him,
which is ideal for him,

‎而且跟希拉里的朋友社交

translation.en: [Michael] I haven't really been doing very much during lockdown.

translation.en: Oh, what a good-looking man I am.
I mean, it's been very challenging, locked in the house together.

translation.en: I mean, it's been quite hard work.
Move.
She's been waiting on him hand and foot for 14 months.

translation.en: I'm amazed Michael wasn't arrested for violations of modern slavery.
translation.zh:
‎我都震惊于
‎他居然没因驱使现代奴隶被捕

translation.en: So, I have taken charge of this final trip,

‎组织这次最终旅行的责任

translation.en: and in order to get them out of the house,
I am sending them around the UK

I won't lie, I had always imagined that our final trip might be to Switzerland,

‎我们的最终旅行会是去瑞士的

But I think going around the UK will be a lot jollier than that.
-Hello, how are you? -Hello, Momsies.
Quite statement outfits.
Well, we're going out for lunch with our darling son.

translation.en: You look like a pair of pimps.
-Oh, charming. -You do!
I feel like I've stepped into a Snoop Dogg video.

translation.en: So rude.
[Michael] Coming from a boy dressed like a tramp.

‎自己穿得跟个流浪汉一样

Why have you taken us to a Chinese takeaway?

translation.en: -It's not a Chinese takeaway. -Yes, it is.
It's not!
It's Gordon Ramsay's Lucky Cat.

translation.en: -No, of course not. -It's not the same.
Gordon Ramsay is not like Colonel Sanders.

I can literally see him. It is!

Um, I'd like a boiled egg.
-Please. -No.
-A boiled egg? -Yes.
Of course, sir.
Let me double-check with the chef and I'll get back to you.

Because we've come to Gordon Ramsay's, one of the great--

translation.en: Oh, fuck off.
Do you think we're the fucking Golden Egg down Old Kent Road?

translation.en: Ask him if he'd like it poached, fried or fucking scrambled up his ass.

‎还是爆炒他的屁股蛋

translation.en: I have to say it's absolutely delicious.
Looks like roadkill, that.

translation.en: Apologies, sir.
Unfortunately, the egg's not going to be possible today.

translation.en: Oh, right. Okay.
Right, I'm glad we cleared that up.
Let me tell you, the trip I have planned

You're going to see the best of British.

Well, unless we go to Scotland.
-[waiter] Everything okay? -Delicious, thank you.
-[Jack] Thank you very much. -All done?
If you can just give me one second, sorry.
Absolutely not. Please take it away.
I cannot bear waste.
It's not that type of restaurant. What are you going to keep from there?

translation.en: -No, it's fine. -You'll keep these?
Hang on. I think I… Could you just pass these over?

‎你能把那些推过来吗？

You'll have a single dumpling later from a dog bag?

translation.en: -Yes, just pour it in. -[Jack sighs]
It's not a dog bag, either.

I'm so sorry.
I think that's enough now.
-No. -Hilary.
-[Jack] You brought Tupperware? -Yes, I did.

‎-你还带了特百惠保鲜盒？
‎-是啊

That's such a waste!

I'm calling him over.
[sing-song] Gordon!

How are we?
-It's delicious. Loving this. -Very well.

‎-非常美味 我超喜欢
‎-非常好吃

-Gordon, thank you so much. -Good luck. Safe travels.

Right, who's getting the bill?

God.

What are you doing?

This is unbelievable.

I will, but I don't want to get dry hands.

‎-我们以为那是干净的

translation.en: Does that look clean?
Okay, admittedly, there is a little speck of something on there.

‎-有点？
‎-是啊 对不起 行了吗？

translation.en: Gordon?
Sorry, chef.
-Gordon? -You've upset him.
It's clean now.
Once I'd packed and Daddy had watched Mommy pack for him,

translation.en: to pilot us around the UK.
-Do you feel nostalgic? -No, I don't.
This car is absolutely ridiculous.
-Oh God, you really feel the road. -You do.
You feel every inch of the road.
-Are we going past Buckingham Palace? -[Jack] Boo.
Shame.
Don't you be horrible about the royal family.
#TeamMeghan.
I've brought some classic British snacks for the UK tour.

translation.en: -Pickled eggs. -[groans]
-I love a pickled egg. -Oh, God.
-I haven't even got them open yet. -Absolutely…
-I hope you're not going to eat one. -I'm going to have one.
-You're not. -I am.
Well, don't put it anywhere near me.
I'm not going to.
Why have we come somewhere
where there's a red light that is on permanently?
Don't worry, it will change soon.
A nice, leisurely drive around the city.

translation.en: Now it's gone.
-I think you've stalled it. -I have.
-[horn beeps] -I think you've got…
Okay, sorry.
-Where do you start the thing? -Sorry.
Shall I just…?
I'll usher them through.
Sorry.
You've got to get to the biting point.
Technically, your hands should have been at ten to two.

‎你的双手
‎要放在10点和2点的位置

‎你要一个没驾照的人

translation.en: Mm, delicious.
How do you pickle an egg? Do you have any idea?

translation.en: What we got in here? Vinegar…
-No! You're dropping it all over me! -Sorry, sorry!

‎-停 全滴到我身上了
‎-抱歉

translation.en: Can I use your coat?
[shouting] No!
You leave my coat alone.
Hey, the Mini was a good idea

‎就是有点挤
‎现在又充斥着一股子腌臭味

For our first stop, Hilary was sending us to Cerne Abbas in Dorset

‎在希拉里的安排下 第一站
‎我们来到了多塞特郡的瑟恩阿伯斯

translation.en: to take part in the ancient ritual of morris dancing.

translation.en: Morris is a uniquely English folk dance

translation.en: with history going back at least 500 years.
Some even believe the dance increases fertility,
translation.zh:
‎有人甚至相信
‎这种舞蹈可以提升繁殖能力

translation.en: including one group who perform

translation.en: the Cerne Abbas Giant.
Hint received, Mother Dearest.
[Michael] You must know that old phrase, don't you?
Which one?
Try everything once in life,
apart from
incest
and morris dancing.
Today, that changes.
The morris dancing bit,
to be clear.
These are the Wessex Morris Men, the most fearsome gang in Dorset.

‎他们是韦塞克斯莫里斯舞者

translation.en: -Bravo. -[man] Oh, hello.

[man 3] Hello.

Around about 40 years.

translation.en: Maybe I could be the next gen.

translation.en: -Yes, that's it. -[man 3] Yes, please.
-Your dancing is appalling. -No.

translation.en: Oh wow.
…because I felt sorry for my wife.

‎你知道的

translation.en: Yeah, would make a play for me and then, you know, I'd get caught up

‎然后我就陷进去了

and all that.
Where do you do your morris dancing?
Usually, we go to the top of Cerne Abbas, where the giant is and we dance there.

‎我们一般去瑟恩阿伯斯的顶端
‎在巨人的所在地跳舞

translation.en: You go there because you're older gentlemen

translation.en: and if you dance on it, it will help…

translation.en: -Yes. -I mean…
[Jack] He's had a few issues with that.
I haven't had any issues with that at all.
You're the one that has the problem.

"WAP," "Wet Ass Pussy."

Nice and gentle.

‎-开始

Well, if you want to all watch me.

I expected it from him. David, I thought better of you.

‎我本以为会是他吐槽我
‎没想到是你 大卫

Don't like to criticize, but it was back on the right.

translation.en: Okay, David. Jesus Christ.
Talk about back seat morris driving.

translation.en: Attract the youth.
-We're not trying to modernize it. -One, two, three.

‎-我们不需要它变得现代化
‎-一 二 三

-[man 5] I can see this will be hard. -[man 4] It is, isn't it?

translation.en: Because I think it's…
Well, I don't think I'm going to be very good.
I think you might be actually better.
It's a one, two, and a… and a caper.
translation.zh: ‎像这样 一 二 小跳步

translation.en: I can see where you get it from.
Some people are natural dancers. They can pick it up very quickly.
translation.zh: ‎有些人是天生的舞者 可以学得很快

translation.en: Now.
Some, you really have to learn by numbers, almost.
That wasn't right. Start again.
-[Jack laughs] -This is getting worse. Getting worse.
Back now. One, two, and a caper.
translation.zh: ‎开始后退 一 二 小跳步

translation.en: One, two, three, hop, one, two, three, hop.
I think we have some work to do before the fertility performance.
translation.zh:
‎看来在进行繁殖力召唤表演前
‎我们要下一番功夫了

translation.en: How many weeks have we got to get this right?
You can dance around with a big grin on your face
and wave your hankies,
but it doesn't look like a morris dance
unless everybody's doing it together.
…and a back, two three.
Swagger back.
Oh, grow up.
-I think we'll take a break. -I think we're getting there.
translation.zh:
‎-我们休息一下吧
‎-我觉得我们快学会了

translation.en: Hit the showers.
Big Mack.
[Jack] Swap shirts?
-Right. -Thank you.
Leave your bells. No tinkling in the showers, lads.
translation.zh:
‎把铃铛卸下来
‎别在澡池子里摇得直响 伙计

translation.en: We had gone from morris boys to morris men.
translation.zh:
‎我们逐渐从莫里斯男孩
‎成长为了莫里斯男人

translation.en: Now, finally, I could don an outfit that would be catnip to the ladies.
translation.zh:
‎终于我迎来了能穿上
‎对女士有致命诱惑的服饰

translation.en: My biggest concern about this morris dance is how we'll divvy up the groupies.
translation.zh:
‎我最担心莫里斯舞的一点是
‎团队角色分配

translation.en: By the time we are done with that fertility dance,
translation.zh:
‎因为在我们跳完这支
‎提升生育力的舞蹈后

translation.en: there will not be a woman within a mile radius of that hill
translation.zh: ‎我们所处山丘上方圆千米之内的女性

translation.en: that has not fallen pregnant.
I'm ready for action.
Now I've got to round up the rest.
Aka Jim, Rolf,
el Chapo, the Scrumpy Monster,
Shagga, and Shakiel.
My ride or dies.
I do need to have a pee, though, before we get in the car.
translation.zh: ‎但在上车前 我要尿个尿

translation.en: Hey, yeah, I'm just coming.
I'm having a pee.
I'll meet you in the car.
Okay, yeah, I'm nearly done.
On our way to the performance, a classically British storm had rolled in.
translation.zh:
‎在我们去表演的路上
‎经典的英伦式暴雨不请自来

translation.en: And although the morris lads were not to be deterred by a bout of strong wind,
translation.zh: ‎莫里斯舞者不会因一场暴风退缩

translation.en: the windbag had second thoughts.
You going to get out the car?
No, I am not.
-We're doing the dance now. -Yeah, I can see.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要开始跳了
‎-我看得出来

translation.en: But no way am I going out there.
-Why? -It's too bloody windy.
Some supportive father you are.
Sorry about him, guys. What formation are we doing?
translation.zh:
‎我为他道歉 各位
‎我们用什么阵容？

translation.en: Two, two, two? Yeah?
Whoa! Hankies in.
Feel the rhythm, feel the rhyme,
lock up your daughters, it's morris dancing time.
translation.zh: ‎锁好你的女儿 莫里斯舞开始了

translation.en: Let's get ready for some hanky-panky.
With Daddy urging us on from the sidelines,
it was time to get spanky with the hanky.
[man 4] Swagger back.
Caper.
Hold on.
-[man 4] And back and turn. -[David] Forwards.
Jesus wept.
Oh no, he's lost the hat!
The key is to morris dance like no one's watching,
translation.zh: ‎跳莫里斯舞的核心是假装无人观看

translation.en: other than the creepy man in the car.
translation.zh: ‎除了车上那个奇怪的老头子

translation.en: I know it's hard to tell, as my dancing is so majestic,
translation.zh:
‎我知道我跳得那么庄严
‎你们很难看出

translation.en: but by this point of battling the wind, I had very much gone rogue.
translation.zh:
‎但在跟暴风对抗的这一刻
‎我内心的野兽已被释放

translation.en: All in.
-[man] Hands up. -[Jack cheers]
And down.
-Lead us off. -[Jack] Nailed it.
We'll follow you.
[Jack] Right, Scrumpy Monster,
where are the afters at?
The pagan ritual had done its job.
And as the fertility squad headed out on the razz,
translation.zh: ‎随着生育小队嬉笑打闹着退场

translation.en: the sun emerged
and so did Daddy.
So, after all this fuss, are you feeling more fecund?
translation.zh:
‎跳完这支舞
‎你觉得自己繁殖能力提高了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I think so.
Although maybe I need to get a bit more involved
translation.zh: ‎不过也许我应该多参与一点

translation.en: if I want to get its full potential.
[Michael] Oh, God.
I can feel its energy now, Daddy.
translation.zh: ‎我能感受到它的能量 老爸

translation.en: Hundreds of years…
…of pagan energy coursing through my veins.
translation.zh: ‎异教徒能量穿梭在我的血管里

translation.en: I really think you're going mad.
-I'm a morris man, now. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我已经成为了莫里斯男人
‎-是的

translation.en: -I've found my calling. -Mm-hm.
Everywhere I go, they shall whisper my name,
translation.zh:
‎无论我去哪
‎他们都会低声呼唤我的名字

translation.en: "There he is…
the man of the bell."
-End of the bell, more like. -Daddy.
With the smell of shepherd's hay still strong in our nostrils,
translation.zh:
‎带着依然环绕在我们鼻腔内的
‎牧羊人干草味

translation.en: the following day, we headed to rural Kent for the next surprise in Hilary's plans.
translation.zh:
‎隔日我们踏上了前往肯特郡郊区之旅
‎迎接希拉里安排的下一个惊喜

translation.en: I've got to say,
Mommy has pulled it out of the bag.
You're going to absolutely love this.
-Do you know where we're going? -No.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道我们要去哪吗？
‎-不知道

translation.en: Your hero's house.
-My hero's house? -Yeah.
-Come on. -I have so many.
You absolutely cream your jeans for him.
translation.zh: ‎你绝对会激动到尿湿牛仔裤的

translation.en: The GOAT.
I don't wear jeans.
No, I give up. Who? Just tell me.
Winston Churchill.
Amazing.
Could you maybe tell your face?
My father will tell you Winston Churchill was the greatest leader that ever lived.
translation.zh:
‎我父亲认为温斯顿丘吉尔是
‎有史以来最伟大的领袖

translation.en: However, to many, he's just the bald bloke who flicked the Vs.
translation.zh:
‎但对于很多人来说
‎他只是摆胜利手势的秃顶老头

translation.en: Chartwell was Churchill's family home for 40 years.
translation.zh:
‎丘吉尔一家在查特韦尔庄园
‎生活了40年

translation.en: Nice gaff.
Though you'd think, in that time, he'd have got around to putting in a hot tub.
translation.zh:
‎虽然你可能觉得
‎热水浴缸才是他最舒适的小窝

translation.en: -[woman] Hello. -Hey.
Michael, welcome to Chartwell.
translation.zh: ‎迈克尔 欢迎来到查特韦尔庄园

translation.en: -Shall we head to the house? -Yes.
Brilliant, let's go.
Property curator Katherine Carter leads us on a unique tour
translation.zh:
‎庄园负责人凯瑟琳娜卡特尔
‎将带我们开启一场独特的参观之旅

translation.en: so that Daddy can get closer to his idol.
translation.zh: ‎让老爸能更近距离接触他的偶像

translation.en: So, this is the drawing room.
So, this was where the Churchill family spent so much time together.
translation.zh: ‎是丘吉尔一家共享家庭时光的地方

translation.en: It was decorated by Churchill's wife, so it is typical of her style.
translation.zh:
‎这个房间由丘吉尔的夫人装饰
‎尽显了她个人独特的风格

translation.en: Is that Winnie?
That is Clementine.
That is Winston's wife of more than 50 years.
translation.zh: ‎丘吉尔的妻子 与他相伴逾50年

translation.en: I thought she was Winnie.
You thought that Winston Churchill's wife was called Winnie?
translation.zh:
‎你以为温斯顿丘吉尔的妻子
‎名叫温妮？

translation.en: Yeah, she was.
Oh no, that was Winnie Mandela.
-Yeah. -That's Winnie Mandela.
What, you think they would have been Winston and Winnie Churchill?
translation.zh: ‎你以为是温斯顿和温妮丘吉尔？

translation.en: Now you put it like that,
it wouldn't have worked.
-Clemmy. -Clemmy.
So, when did you get into Winston Churchill?
translation.zh: ‎你何时开始对丘吉尔感兴趣的？

translation.en: I studied history and had always been interested in the Second World War.
translation.zh:
‎我学习的是历史
‎而且一直对二战兴趣深厚

translation.en: So really, Chartwell is the best possible of both.
translation.zh:
‎所以查特韦尔庄园是能
‎兼顾我兴趣和工作的最佳选择

translation.en: -So you know a lot about Churchill? -A little bit, yeah.
Probably more than you.
Churchill's birthday?
30th November 1874.
-Slow out the blocks. -30th November…
Well, it doesn't work if you just say it after you've heard her say it.
What was his middle name?
-Spencer. -Oh! Is it?
-And Leonard. -Yes, and Leonard.
translation.zh:
‎-还有伦纳德
‎-对 还有伦纳德

translation.en: What was Churchill's favorite brand of cigar?
translation.zh: ‎丘吉尔最爱的雪茄品牌是什么？

translation.en: Romeo and Juliets.
Bit slow.
-Okay, let's see some more of the house. -Lovely.
[Michael] Can you behave?
Next on the tour was Churchill's famous study.
translation.zh:
‎下一站
‎我们参观了著名的丘吉尔书房

translation.en: This is where Churchill would work through the night
translation.zh: ‎这里是丘吉尔彻夜工作的场所

translation.en: on speeches, articles, correspondences, books.
translation.zh:
‎准备演讲 撰写文章
‎书信往来 阅读书籍

translation.en: So this was, for him, the beating heart of Chartwell.
translation.zh:
‎所以对他来说
‎这里是查特韦尔庄园的心脏

translation.en: Churchill quiz round two.
-[Michael] No. -What was his catchphrase?
Give me strength.
"We will fight them on the beaches."
-Thought you'd get that. -That is a classic.
Do you dispute that?
-Well, it wasn't a catchphrase. -I think it was.
When Paddy McGuinness goes out, people shout, "No likey, no lighty."
translation.zh:
‎你以为帕迪麦吉尼斯出门的时候
‎没人冲他喊“不喜欢 就灭灯”吗？

translation.en: Who's Paddy McGuinness?
Is he a historian?
-No? -No.
He's one of the great broadcasters of our age and you don't know who he is.
translation.zh:
‎他是我们年龄段的著名主持人
‎你居然不知道他是谁

translation.en: -Anything to do with the Guinness family? -No, he's not.
translation.zh:
‎-他跟吉尼斯家族有关系吗？
‎-没关系

translation.en: Who was the prime minister before Churchill?
Neville Chamberlain.
Before that, Stanley Baldwin.
Do you want to go back?
-No, you don't. -George Washington?
-George Washington? -Well.
-He wasn't prime minster. -No, he was president.
But he was before Neville Chamberlain.
translation.zh: ‎但他是在内维尔张伯伦前的总统

translation.en: So, half a point for me.
I do have something special to show you if you'd like to see something extra.
translation.zh:
‎如果你们想看点不一样的
‎我有特别的东西想向你们展示

translation.en: Beyond that door…
Can you imagine? Have a guess.
translation.zh: ‎想象一下是什么 猜一下

translation.en: Bedroom?
-Yeah? -Look how excited he is.
-[Michael] Look. -[Jack] Wow.
This room, we've only been able to open
to very small numbers in the last couple of years,
translation.zh: ‎只向极小一部分游客开放过

translation.en: and so it is left exactly as Winston knew it.
translation.zh: ‎所以内部陈设完全没有变过

translation.en: Would my father be able to get into the bed?
I'm afraid not. No, that wouldn't be possible.
See? He's got his father above his bed.
translation.zh:
‎看到了吗？他在自己床上方
‎挂了他爸爸的照片

translation.en: You haven't got a picture of me anywhere in the house,
translation.zh: ‎但你家里连一张我的照片都没有

translation.en: let alone above your bed.
And then he's got his mother to his right.
translation.zh: ‎在他床的右方 他挂了他妈妈的照片

translation.en: Maybe it helped him last longer if he was getting amorous with Winnie.
translation.zh:
‎这样他跟温妮亲热的时候
‎或许能撑比较久

translation.en: Clemmy.
There is one extra set of doors behind me
and I wonder if one of you might like
to have a look inside.
-Go on, mate. Knock yourself out. -It takes a bit of a pull.
translation.zh:
‎-去吧 伙计 敲开大门
‎-往外拉

translation.en: -[Michael gasps] -[Jack] What is it? -A bath. -[Jack gasps]
So, Churchill famously had two, if not three, baths a day.
translation.zh:
‎丘吉尔酷爱洗澡
‎每天要洗三次澡 最少也要两次

translation.en: He would also work from the bath.
translation.zh: ‎他甚至会一边洗澡一边工作

translation.en: So, often, he would have one of his secretaries sat just around the corner,
translation.zh: ‎他洗澡时会让秘书坐在这个角落

translation.en: here on this little chair.
[Jack] Bit #MeToo.
How did he get out of it?
He was quite portly.
I mean, that wouldn't help.
I mean, if I was in that bath, I wouldn't be able to get out without help.
translation.zh: ‎如果我在这洗澡 我一个人很难起来

translation.en: When you get to a certain age,
you see a bath and all you can think of is how you get in and get out of it.
translation.zh:
‎看到浴缸所想的
‎只会是怎么进去 怎么出来

translation.en: Let's get a picture of you in his bathroom.
translation.zh: ‎我们给你和他的浴室来一张合影

translation.en: Why would I want a picture in his bathroom?
Because this is amazing access that we've got
to your hero's bathroom.
Try and smile. Look happy.
Do you want to do one where you look like you're flushing it?
translation.zh: ‎你想靠近马桶假装冲水来一张吗？

translation.en: No, I do not want to lean over and flush it.
translation.zh: ‎我不想一边冲马桶一边合影 好吗？

translation.en: Bet he cooked up a few bombing raids there.
Can you just show a little bit of respect?
We're in the home of a great man, one of the greatest men in history,
translation.zh:
‎我们所处的是一个伟人
‎史上最伟大的人的家里

translation.en: and all you're talking about is him cooking up bombs.
translation.zh: ‎你想到的却只有他蹲过大便

translation.en: Right.
-Thank you very much, Katherine. -No problem at all.
translation.zh:
‎-非常感谢 凯瑟琳娜
‎-不客气

translation.en: And I apologize for him.
[whispering] Go on, last chance to get in the bed.
We'll do a quick selfie.
-No way. -Why?
-I am not getting in Churchill's bed. -It's Churchill's bed.
translation.zh:
‎-我不会上丘吉尔的床的
‎-这可是丘吉尔的床

translation.en: -You'd love that. -No.
-Who'd love it? -You would.
I would not. Why would I want to desecrate Winston Churchill's bed?
translation.zh:
‎才不会 我怎么会
‎亵渎温斯顿丘吉尔的床？

translation.en: -You don't have to desecrate. Just get in. -Getting in it would desecrate it.
An amazing visit.
What's this here?
-[Jack] Visitors' book. -Oh, a visitors' book.
-Right. -I don't think it's a book you sign.
-I think it's an exhibit. -No, it's alright.
Daddy, it's an exhibit.
Why would they have a visitors' book underneath an inch of glass
if they wanted you to sign it?
I'll just do my name here.
[whispering] You're ridiculous.
There we are. I'll just put it there.
[whispering] Quick, get out.
You've chipped the glass, Daddy.
Right. Okay.
-There we go. -You have sullied the Churchill house.
translation.zh:
‎-我们走
‎-你损坏了丘吉尔的房子

translation.en: -It's chipped, Daddy. -Yes, I know. Okay?
translation.zh:
‎-玻璃碎了 老爸
‎-我知道 行了吧？

translation.en: Let's get to the car.
You desecrated your hero's visitors' book.
translation.zh: ‎你亵渎了你偶像的访客记录

translation.en: Next time you're planning on vandalizing someone's property, don't leave your name.
translation.zh:
‎下次你计划破坏别人的物产时
‎不要留名

translation.en: Very funny.
Next, we're off to Devon,
famous for cream teas and being the birthplace of Michael Whitehall.
translation.zh:
‎以奶油茶点闻名
‎也是迈克尔怀特豪尔的出生地

translation.en: Although, weirdly, they don't put that on the signs.
translation.zh:
‎但奇怪的是
‎他们没把这放在宣传语上

translation.en: Probably just ran out of space.
To get there, we'd be passing one of the UK's most famous sights.
translation.zh:
‎要去那里
‎我们得穿越英国的著名景点之一

translation.en: [gasps] Look, Stonehenge!
-Yeah? -Can we go and see it?
-No, of course we can't go and see it. -Why? I've never been to Stonehenge.
translation.zh:
‎-当然不行
‎-为什么？我从没去过巨石阵

translation.en: -We're just passing it. -I don't want to pass it.
translation.zh:
‎-我们只是路过
‎-我不想只是路过

translation.en: -Pull over. -No.
-We've passed Stonehenge so many times. -Yes, but I've never seen it.
translation.zh:
‎-我们路过很多次巨石阵
‎-对 但我从没去看过

translation.en: This is one of the most iconic sights in the country
translation.zh: ‎这是我国最著名标志性的景点之一

translation.en: and we're driving past it.
There is nothing to see up close other than a load of rocks.
translation.zh: ‎凑近看了 也不过就是一堆石头而已

translation.en: Slow the car down. I want to get a proper look.
translation.zh: ‎能开慢点吗？我想仔细看一看

translation.en: No, I am not.
-I can't… I've never seen it live. -What are you doing?
translation.zh:
‎-不要 我从没亲眼见过
‎-你在干吗？

translation.en: -No, I want to see Stonehenge. -Shut that sunroof. No.
-We're missing it. -Stop. Come down.
translation.zh:
‎-我们要开过了
‎-停下 快下来

translation.en: -Ow! Daddy! -Come down!
Daddy!
We've missed Stonehenge.
-It's freezing. -I wanted to get a better view.
I've been assaulted by my father.
I think my wrist's broken.
No, it's always been that limp.
Just because you were there when they were erected.
translation.zh: ‎因为你在的时候 它硬不起来

translation.en: Very funny.
We were headed to Burgh Island.
Since 1929, the art deco hotel has been a renowned escape
translation.zh:
‎1929年起
‎这家具有艺术装修风格的酒店

translation.en: for the rich and famous.
But the island is best known for inspiring Agatha Christie
to write novels here whilst resident at the beach house.
translation.zh:
‎在阿加莎克里斯蒂旅居此处时
‎给予了她小说灵感

translation.en: How bored do you have to be on holiday to write a novel?
translation.zh:
‎一个人得多无聊
‎才会在度假时写小说？

translation.en: In a dramatic twist,
twice a day, the island is cut off from the mainland by the tide.
translation.zh:
‎这座岛屿一天中有两次会因浪潮上涨
‎与大陆彻底分离

translation.en: -Jack. -Love that salty sea air.
It's quarter to five.
We've got to get that sea tractor, so move.
translation.zh: ‎我们要赶轮渡 加快动作

translation.en: Yeah, I am moving.
Fish and chips.
-Please can we get fish and chips? -No, we are not--
-I haven't eaten. I'm starving. -We are not getting fish and chips.
translation.zh:
‎-我还没吃饭 我饿死了
‎-我们不会买炸鱼薯条的

translation.en: -Daddy, please! -No!
We're by the seaside, we have to.
translation.zh: ‎来到了海边 就该买炸鱼薯条

translation.en: -We're not. Come on. -Why?
We've got a sea tractor to catch.
-At five o'clock. -Yeah.
-See the time now? -What's the time?
[together] Quarter to five.
-More than enough. -Fifteen minutes.
I will be back. I'll meet you down there.
-Take there… -Yes, I've got…
Don't be ridiculous.
-You are a joke. -[groaning] Oh, these bags.
I'll see if they've got a battered sausage or something.
translation.zh: ‎我会看看他们有没有碎香肠的

translation.en: Do not be late.
-[Michael] Ah, hello. -[man] Hello. Good evening, sir.
translation.zh:
‎-你好
‎-你好 先生 下午好

translation.en: -Could you help me with these bags? -I certainly can.
translation.zh:
‎-你能帮我把行李拿上去吗？
‎-当然

translation.en: Can I get the plaice?
And a cod.
And then, like, two portions…
Mmm… How big is a large?
-Are we waiting for anyone else? -Yes.
The imbecile that is my son
who's gone to get fish and chips.
Hopefully, he'll be here in a moment.
Oh, no, that's my hotel keycard. Sorry.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的酒店房卡 抱歉

translation.en: Oh God, where's my wallet?
-Jack, where the fuck are you? -[music grows tense]
Right, let's get this show on the road, okay?
Daddy!
Don't go, Daddy!
[shouting] Michael Whitehall, come back here now!
translation.zh: ‎迈克尔怀特豪尔 快回来

translation.en: Daddy!
Daddy!
[Michael] Where have you been?
-Why did you leave? -Where the fuck have you been?
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么走了？
‎-你他妈滚哪去了？

translation.en: -I was getting fish and chips for us. -Don't be ridiculous.
This is a public ferry. It's not your private yacht.
translation.zh: ‎这是公共轮渡 不是你的私人游艇

translation.en: My fish and chips are ruined. I'm soaking wet. [Michael] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎我的炸鱼薯条毁了 整个人也湿透了

translation.en: -Have a chip. -No, thank you very much.
Imbecile.
That's what you are.
You know what that means, "imbecile"?
It means missing a ferry so that you can get fish and chips
translation.zh:
‎它的意思就是为了买炸鱼薯条
‎错过轮渡

translation.en: and then dropping them in the sand.
-I've got another word for you. -Yeah?
Traitor.
-Ridiculous. -That's what you are.
-Leaving… -Don't do that.
-…a man… -Don't do that.
…behind.
Daddy, you've got a chip on your shoulder.
[Michael] Oh, very funny.
We couldn't come to the Agatha Christie island
translation.zh: ‎既然到了阿加莎克里斯蒂之岛

translation.en: and not have the full detective experience.
translation.zh: ‎就不能不体验一把侦探冒险

translation.en: So, Hilary had booked us into an immersive murder mystery evening.
translation.zh:
‎所以希拉里为我们预定了
‎沉浸式谋杀谜案之夜

translation.en: Hotel guests are all pre-allocated characters
translation.zh: ‎酒店宾客会被提前安排角色

translation.en: to take part in a theatrical show.
I was to be the stable boy and Daddy, the pub landlord.
translation.zh: ‎我的角色是马夫 老爸则是酒吧店主

translation.en: [mimics Devon dialect] Mikey?
You ready to go up the manor house with all them posh folk?
translation.zh:
‎你准备好去庄园宅邸
‎会见上流社会人士了吗？

translation.en: [mimics French accent] I am ready.
I'm ready to go.
[normal voice] You're meant to be the pub landlord. What is this?
translation.zh: ‎你不是酒吧店主吗？这是什么？

translation.en: I'm Hercule Proirot.
That's not how this works.
You have to be the character they allocated you or it doesn't work.
translation.zh:
‎你要扮演他们给你安排的角色
‎不然就玩不起来了

translation.en: [in normal voice] Why would I want to play a pub landlord?
You mean stand there saying,
[gruffly] "Oh, morning, everyone! You want half a bitter?"
and all that?
So, your mother and I decided I would be Poirot.
translation.zh: ‎所以你妈和我决定我应该扮演波洛

translation.en: How much effort you've gone to as well.
-No, I haven't. I just threw this on. -Oh, you threw that on?
translation.zh:
‎-没有 我就随意套了一套
‎-随意套了一套？

translation.en: I often slip into a false moustache of an evening.
I have to begrudgingly admit it does kind of suit you.
translation.zh: ‎虽然我不想承认 但这确实很适合你

translation.en: You look like Hitler on holiday.
translation.zh: ‎你活脱脱一个在度假的希特勒

translation.en: Let's hear that accent again.
[mimics French accent] My name is Hercule Proirot.
"Proirot"? No.
-Proirot. -Proirot?
-Poiroo. -Poirot.
Poirot, yeah.
Kit's fine, accent needs a bit of work.
translation.zh: ‎装备不错 但口音还需要加强

translation.en: Wanting to improve his "Prer-roo" impression,
Daddy took matters into his own hands.
translation.zh: ‎老爸决定把命运掌握在自己手上

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I'm calling David.
-David who? -David Suchet, of course.
translation.zh:
‎-哪个大卫？
‎-当然是大卫苏切特

translation.en: My friend.
You're not calling David Suchet.
-I am. -He's not going to pick up.
I am calling David Suchet, the real Poirot.
translation.zh: ‎我要打给真正的波洛大卫苏切特

translation.en: You can't call David Suchet dressed as Poirot.
translation.zh:
‎你不能打扮成波洛的样子
‎打电话给大卫苏切特

translation.en: You barely know the man.
He's going to think you're absolutely bonkers.
He's never going to answer.
Fifty quid he doesn't pick up.
-Hello? -Fuck off.
-Michael Whitehall here. -[laughing] Great to see you.
translation.zh:
‎-我是迈克尔怀特豪尔
‎-很高兴见到你

translation.en: What are you doing?
-Hey. Hey, David, it's Jack. -Hi.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 大卫 我是杰克
‎-嗨

translation.en: -[softly] Could you call him Sir David? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-杰克 你能叫他“大卫先生”吗？
‎-好

translation.en: Don't be so familiar with him.
As you can probably tell, I'm playing Poirot.
translation.zh: ‎你可能猜到了 我在扮演波洛

translation.en: I can see that.
I'm having a bit of a problem getting the accent right
and I wondered whether you could give me a bit of help.
translation.zh: ‎不知道你能不能给我点帮助

translation.en: You know that Nazi villain in Indiana Jones?
translation.zh:
‎你知道《夺宝奇兵》里的
‎那个纳粹恶棍吗？

translation.en: -It was sounding a bit like him. -Yes.
-Shall we work on it a little together? -Yes.
Do you find it difficult, "Poirot"?
[speaks French] My name is Hercule Poirot.
[speaks French] My name is Hercule Poirot.
[in English] Good. That was very good.
I thought that was much better.
Anything else I can do?
I mean, there's so much I'd like to try and do, but I don't…
translation.zh: ‎我有很多想尝试去做的 但我不…

translation.en: You know what I mean, but I…
Yeah, thank you very much. We appreciate your time, Sir David.
translation.zh:
‎对 非常感谢
‎谢谢你抽出时间 大卫先生

translation.en: -[Michael] So lovely to see you. -Very nice to see you, too.
Nice man.
-Did you notice how friendly he was? -Yes, you're friends with Poirot.
translation.zh:
‎-注意到他有多友好了吗？
‎-对 你是波洛的朋友

translation.en: Well done.
We had no option.
Daddy had to engage in a role-playing game with strangers.
translation.zh:
‎老爸不得不跟陌生人一起
‎参加角色表演

translation.en: I honestly think he'd rather have been poisoned by the butler.
translation.zh: ‎我真心认为他更愿意被管家毒死

translation.en: You've sorted these drinks?
-Everyone's served? -Yes, everything's perfect.
translation.zh:
‎-所有人都拿到了？
‎-是 一切都很完美

translation.en: -Good evening, vicar. -Good evening.
-Hello, milady. -Good evening, Simon.
translation.zh:
‎-夫人 你好
‎-晚上好 西蒙

translation.en: In tonight's murder mystery,
all the hotel guests were joining in,
pretending to be characters they'd been allocated.
A company of actors would perform key scenes
and then mingle with the hotel guests, dropping clues as they go.
translation.zh:
‎然后混入酒店宾客
‎随着剧情发展放出线索

translation.en: Everyone's task was to figure out who the murderer was,
which we would find out at the end of the evening.
translation.zh: ‎今晚最后 谜底将被揭晓

translation.en: Leading the scenes tonight were…
Good evening, everyone.
Lady Buffy Manger.
…the lady of the house,
the vicar,
the maid,
the man with a gin and tonic
and, of course, the policeman.
A bit heavy underfoot, that one.
She wouldn't be very good doing Footsteps in the Fog
translation.zh:
‎她在《谋杀迷雾》里
‎绝对藏不住脚步声

translation.en: or one of those murder mysteries.
translation.zh: ‎或者其他任意一个谋杀悬案里

translation.en: Like a horse coming in.
Clomping in here, no?
I think that vicar's very dodgy.
The one over there.
I'm pretty sure he's wearing a wig.
And I would never trust a man with a wig.
translation.zh: ‎我绝不会相信一个戴假发的男人

translation.en: You're telling me that in a false moustache.
Also, he's not a real vicar.
-Isn't he? -No, they're actors.
translation.zh:
‎-不是吗？
‎-不是 他们是演员

translation.en: Oh, I see.
You haven't really understood the concept of this.
-[Michael] That's straight vodka. -[Jack snickers]
-It is. -[Jack] He's a drunk, creepy vicar.
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-他是个酒鬼 诡异的牧师

translation.en: Maybe that's why he commits his horrific crimes.
translation.zh:
‎也许就是因为这样
‎他才会犯下可怕的罪行

translation.en: Or sex.
Definitely. Sex murderer.
I smelled that vodka on his breath when he came at me in the stables.
translation.zh:
‎当他在马厩扑向她时
‎她闻到了他吐气里的伏特加味

translation.en: At the moment, he's…
-[Jack] Prime suspect. -He would be my prime suspect.
translation.zh:
‎-首要嫌疑犯
‎-他是我的首要嫌疑犯

translation.en: The idea of immersive theater was lost on Daddy,
translation.zh:
‎沉浸式戏剧似乎
‎已经消失在老爸的意识里

translation.en: who only seemed immersed in his own confusion.
translation.zh: ‎他自顾自沉浸在了自己的困惑里

translation.en: Perhaps a spot of backstory would help.
translation.zh: ‎也许一点剧情推动可以把他拉回来

translation.en: Welcome to my beautiful home.
We're here tonight to talk about our dear old friend, Rose Dimper.
translation.zh:
‎我们今晚齐聚于此 是为了
‎聊聊我们亲爱的老朋友萝斯蒂姆普

translation.en: [softly] Who the fuck is Rose Dimples?
[mumbling] Shut up. She's speaking.
We learn that a local resident has passed away
translation.zh: ‎我们获知一位当地居民去世了

translation.en: and left all her money to the villagers.
translation.zh: ‎并将她所有的财产都留给了村民

translation.en: Sorry to have to interrupt you, Mrs. Buffy.
Your husband…
He's dead.
We then learn Buffy's husband had huge debts and a secret child.
translation.zh:
‎我们随后又获知 巴菲的丈夫
‎有巨额欠款和一个私生子

translation.en: So the hunt for the killer was on.
That vicar has definitely got the hots for the lady of the house.
translation.zh:
‎那个牧师绝对在迷恋
‎这座宅邸的女主人

translation.en: Mark my words.
I must ask none of you to leave the island.
translation.zh: ‎在场所有人均不可离开这座岛

translation.en: [Michael] Right, let's get this over with.
[mimics French accent] Constable, there is no need for any of this.
translation.zh: ‎警官 根本无需如此繁琐

translation.en: That is the man you want.
The randy vicar!
Slightly jumped the gun there on the denouement.
-We haven't had any of the clues yet. -Oh, right, sorry.
It's fine, carry on. As you were. Sorry.
translation.zh: ‎没事了 继续吧 抱歉

translation.en: While Poirot worked on another theory, it was the stable boy's time to shine.
translation.zh:
‎就在波洛寻找新理论时
‎马夫开始大展身手

translation.en: -Simon, can I talk to you? -Oh, yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-西蒙 我能跟你谈谈吗？
‎-当然

translation.en: -You know who I blame, don't you? -Yes?
Harry the gardener.
He was the one who put the nail in the chair.
I mean, I asked him to, but…
I didn't ask him to stick it out, did I?
No, no, you didn't.
Maybe I should look for a new gardener.
Okay, I'll leave you to it. I'm still in shock at the moment.
translation.zh: ‎好 就这样吧 我依然很混乱

translation.en: Yeah.
I think some people are going to get arrested for over-acting.
translation.zh: ‎有些人因为表演过度要被逮捕了

translation.en: I think, if that's a crime, you're going away for life.
translation.zh:
‎如果真有这项罪名
‎你就会被判无期徒刑

translation.en: I think I'm in there with the lady.
Oh, Jack, she's a widow.
A WILF.
What's a WILF?
A WILF.
A widow I'd like--
Ladies and gentlemen. Dinner is served in the dining room.
translation.zh:
‎女士们、先生们
‎晚餐在餐厅准备好了

translation.en: I have a new suspect.
He sounded Russian to me, that bloke.
translation.zh: ‎那家伙听起来像个俄罗斯人

translation.en: That's the man that checked us in. He actually works at the hotel.
translation.zh:
‎他是今天帮我们登记入住的人
‎他是酒店的真员工

translation.en: [softly] Probably slipped him some polonium.
-Hello. -Hello.
Daddy was still on the case.
The case of finding out how pissed you can get
in the course of a murder mystery.
Oh God!
I think the great Hercule Poirot may have got that one wrong.
translation.zh: ‎看来伟大的赫尔克里波洛指认错人了

translation.en: What are you doing?
-What are you doing? -I'm just checking.
-He's dead. -He is dead.
The vicar is dead,
your prime suspect.
Yes. Oh…
Disappointing.
Poor vicar. Oh, look. He's left his Bible.
translation.zh:
‎可怜的牧师
‎他的《圣经》放这里

translation.en: -Oh, my goodness! -Oh God.
-Cecil! -[Michael groans]
-Madam Faff. -[Lady Buffy] Oh, PC Bailey, quick! Quick!
translation.zh:
‎-大惊小怪的女人
‎-贝利警官 快来

translation.en: I'm starting to think we should have been concentrating harder on the clues.
translation.zh: ‎我开始觉得我们应该更专注于线索

translation.en: -I think we can rule out the vicar. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-我觉得我们可以排除牧师了
‎-没错

translation.en: Well, I changed my mind about him.
-Oh, had you? -Yeah.
-What, when you saw him dead in his salad? -Yeah, I mean, obviously…
translation.zh:
‎-因为他在你眼前死了吗？
‎-对 我是说 显然…

translation.en: Nobody leaves the island until I solve this.
translation.zh: ‎在我破案前 任何人都不许离开小岛

translation.en: Poor vicar.
I picked up his Bible.
I thought we could maybe
read some passages later in our room.
Do you think when he stands up--
-It's not actually a Bible. -What is it?
It's Alan Sugar's autobiography.
-Bear the thought… -The plot thickens.
Probably topped himself reading it.
translation.zh:
‎也许他在读的时候
‎不小心把自己弄死了

translation.en: Whilst we tucked into our main course, the suspects were working the room.
translation.zh:
‎就在我们享用正餐时
‎嫌疑犯也在同个房间里工作

translation.en: -Hello, Simon. -Oh, hello.
-Good evening, sir. -Good evening.
-Oh, I do like your moustache. -Oh, thank you.
-Charming. -Can I take your plate for you?
Yes. Thank you very much.
Yes, Simon,
I think I do know who it is.
It's Buffy, you know?
Yes, she's having an affair.
-No! -No…
I've seen Gino coming down the back stairs late at night, you know?
translation.zh: ‎我曾撞见吉诺半夜从后楼梯进来

translation.en: What, he had her up the back stairs?
In her bedroom, yes.
Anyway, I think I've said too much now. I'd better go.
translation.zh: ‎总之我说得有点多了 我得走了

translation.en: I think you've said too much.
All guests had noted down their prime suspect,
translation.zh: ‎所有宾客都已锁定各自的首要嫌疑犯

translation.en: and it was time to find out who had got it right.
[PC Bailey] Kate, over here.
[Jack] Oh, po-po.
Denouement, denouement!
From the clues that I've seen,
I believe I know who the murderer is.
Buffy Manger
didn't love her husband as much as we thought she did.
translation.zh: ‎并不如我们认为那般爱她的丈夫

translation.en: In fact,
she's been having an affair with Gino.
And she was putting it on me.
And she was putting it on him.
All over me like a rash.
But I still don't think she's the murderer.
The person I believe it is
is Kate.
No!
Whatever gave you that idea?
Oh my God.
Because you were the only one
with a key to the trophy cabinet that had the poison in it.
translation.zh: ‎装有毒药的奖杯陈列柜的钥匙

translation.en: Oh! Boom!
With that plot twist, the mystery was wrapped up.
translation.zh: ‎剧情反转 谜案拉上帷幕

translation.en: No one could piss on this parade.
-Where are you off to, Poirot? -What?
[mimics French accent] The great Poirot
has the answer to this.
He's had too much champagne.
You are an oaf.
It is quite clear this woman is plainly innocent.
translation.zh: ‎显而易见 这位女士是无辜的

translation.en: The woman that you need to find is this woman here!
-Oh no, you've got it wrong! -The great Poirot knows.
translation.zh:
‎-不 你抓错人了
‎-伟大的波洛都知道

translation.en: -Do you have any evidence? -Do I need evidence? It is all here.
translation.zh:
‎-你有证据吗？
‎-要什么证据？都在这里

translation.en: No, you definitely need evidence.
The policeman has provided evidence that it was the maid,
so it was the maid what done it.
-This man is an oaf. -Okay, right.
That's not how these work.
The maid did it.
It was me. Yes. And there's no way you're going to take me to prison.
translation.zh:
‎是我做的
‎但我不会让你们送我进监狱的

translation.en: -I'm out of here now! -[Michael] Take this woman!
-No! -Take this woman!
The great Poirot knew all along.
I needed to get that out of her.
And she did it in the end. She panicked and admitted it.
translation.zh: ‎她也说出来了 她恐慌地承认了

translation.en: -I knew it. All along. -Right.
Poirot's having a bit of a shocker at the office today, isn't he?
All great sleuths have their off days.
Today was such a day.
[Jack] This is the best murder mystery ever.
For the next leg of our journey,
Hilary was sending us to the Whitehall family's ancestral seat:
translation.zh:
‎希拉里将我们送到了
‎怀特豪尔家族的祖籍地

translation.en: Wales.
A place known for its ragged coastlines, beautiful mountains,
translation.zh:
‎一个闻名于参差不齐的海岸线
‎和俊美山川的地方

translation.en: and where people are outnumbered by sheep 3-1.
translation.zh: ‎在这里 羊人比例达到了三比一

translation.en: We could still take them.
Do you want a Flump?
No, thank you.
How long is this drive? Six hours?
-No, I don't think it's as long as that. -I think it is.
-Do you? -Yeah.
With your granny driving, probably six hours.
translation.zh: ‎就你这龟爬的速度 差不多六小时

translation.en: I'm gonna try and sleep.
What the fuck is that?
You're like the Elephant Man!
[chuckles] It's my travel pillow.
You can sleep anywhere. You can sleep to the side.
translation.zh: ‎这样你在哪都能睡 侧靠着睡

translation.en: You can sleep everywhere.
So, you're going through one of the most beautiful parts of the country,
translation.zh: ‎你正行驶在英国最美的地方

translation.en: and you can't see anything
because you've got some stupid Elephant Man hat on.
translation.zh: ‎因为你戴了一个愚蠢的大象头套

translation.en: It's not an Elephant Man hat.
It's my ostrich head sleeping pillow.
And I cannot sleep in a car now without it.
translation.zh: ‎现在我坐车 没它就睡不了

translation.en: [Michael] It looks like a gray bollock.
translation.zh: ‎看起来就跟灰色的蛋蛋一样

translation.en: -Shall I put on some music? -Don't put on music.
No? I've got some good tunes, mate.
I've loaded something up there for you to play.
translation.zh: ‎我已经在那里放了一些东西给你放

translation.en: What?
Because this trip's about our family and our heritage, and all that.
translation.zh:
‎因为这趟旅行是关于
‎我们家族和传统特色的

translation.en: I thought you'd enjoy it.
No, let's get some club classics.
-No, just put this on. -What, here?
Yeah.
This?
[Michael on stereo] Chapter One: Keeping Up Appearances.
-Are you joking? -Around the time Adolf Hitler--
-What do you mean, joking? -This is your audiobook.
Yeah.
You have loaded up the audiobook
to your own autobiography for us to listen to.
Yes, so you can listen about your family and your heritage and life.
translation.zh:
‎对啊 好让你了解你的家族
‎和你的传统及生命

translation.en: -Do you have any idea how weird that is? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道这样有多奇怪吗？
‎-哪有？

translation.en: -Sure. -You're literally listening to yourself.
Yeah. Yeah, I mean, I was reading it…
But I thought you'd enjoy it. I mean, what else are you gonna do?
translation.zh:
‎但我觉得你会喜欢
‎不然你还能干吗？

translation.en: -At least it'll help me go to sleep. -Shh!
…traveling around the country as a gas instructor in the RAF.
translation.zh:
‎作为英国皇家空军的
‎防毒气教官环游国家…

translation.en: -No one pictured him… -Can you turn yourself down?
translation.zh:
‎-没人将他看作…
‎-你可以小声一点吗？

translation.en: Both versions of you.
…as a pilot with a fur-lined flying jacket.
translation.zh:
‎作为一名
‎穿着皮质飞行夹克的飞行员…

translation.en: -Stereo Michael Whitehall. -…dark silk cravat.
translation.zh:
‎-迈克尔怀特豪尔双声道
‎-丝绸领带…

translation.en: This could break a terrorist.
It was against…
It was about a Spanish film.
translation.zh: ‎这是关于一部西班牙电影的故事

translation.en: Rose Tobias Shaw
was an American casting director with a rather flaky reputation.
translation.zh: ‎是位名声不太好的美国选角导演

translation.en: -"No, I haven't, but it'll be fine." -What the fuck?
translation.zh:
‎-“我还没有 但会没事的”
‎-什么鬼？

translation.en: -Daddy! -What?
-Why have you done that? -I didn't want you to miss this bit.
translation.zh:
‎-你干吗开窗户？
‎-我不想你错过这段

translation.en: It's with Judy Dench.
-What? -She's so funny.
Judy Dench stuck her head round the corner.
translation.zh:
‎朱迪丹奇把她的脑袋
‎从角落探了出来

translation.en: "Did you know there's a wedding reception going on in there, Michael?"
translation.zh:
‎“你知道这里在办婚宴吗
‎迈克尔？”

translation.en: she said and disappeared.
The trouble with St. John's Church, William,
translation.zh: ‎威廉的圣约翰教堂的麻烦在于

translation.en: was that it wasn't in William.
There was a church in William, but it wasn't St. John's…
translation.zh:
‎威廉确实有一座教堂
‎但不是圣约翰…

translation.en: [Jack] After that historical journey, we arrived at Palé Hall Hotel,
translation.zh:
‎随着这场历史之旅的进行
‎我们抵达了位于斯诺登山山脚的

translation.en: at the foothills of Mount Snowdon.
We were meeting Hilary
to celebrate the fact that today is my parents' 35th wedding anniversary.
translation.zh:
‎共同庆祝我父母的
‎35周年结婚纪念日

translation.en: [Jack] This looks nice.
[Michael] Very nice.
We've got a big one tonight, your mother and I.
translation.zh: ‎对于你妈和我来说 今天是个大日子

translation.en: Do you realize that?
-The anniversary? -Yeah.
-It's-- -Thirty-five years?
-Yeah. It's a big one. -Amazing.
If you see my hat outside the door of the room, then you'll know…
translation.zh:
‎如果你在房门外看到我的帽子
‎那就是…

translation.en: we're in action.
Might see if this hotel has any outhouses I can stay in.
translation.zh: ‎这酒店有户外厕所给我待吗？

translation.en: I hope you've packed plenty of earplugs, too,
if you know what your mother's like when she gets going.
I might not even be checking into this hotel at this rate.
translation.zh:
‎我可能都不会
‎用这个价格入住这家酒店

translation.en: -Don't worry if-- -Wow.
-If you hear screaming-- -Shut up. Look!
translation.zh:
‎-如果你听到尖叫…
‎-别说了 看

translation.en: -[Jack] Isn't this beautiful? -Very nice.
Why would anyone want to build a house like that in Wales?
translation.zh: ‎怎么会有人在威尔士建那种房子？

translation.en: [Jack] Can you behave, please?
No comments like that when we get out of this car.
Mr. Whitehall?
-That's me. Hello, how are you? -How are you? How was your journey?
translation.zh:
‎-是我 你好 你好吗？
‎-你好 旅途如何？

translation.en: -Very well. Very good. -Welcome to Palé Hall.
translation.zh:
‎-非常好
‎-欢迎来到帕莱大厅酒店

translation.en: -Hey, how are you, mate? -Very good.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 你好吗 伙计？
‎-很好

translation.en: Have you got a beautiful young lady in here waiting for me?
translation.zh: ‎有没有一位年轻美丽的女士在等我？

translation.en: -I'm sure we do. -[Jack] Beautiful young lady?
Please don't talk about my mother like that.
-Beautiful, young… Well-built, buxom… -[Jack] Stop!
translation.zh:
‎-年轻美丽 身材丰满…
‎-够了

translation.en: -[Jack, sing-song] Hello! -[Hilary] Hello, hello, hello!
-Hello. -Lovely to see you, Momsies.
-Would you like to kiss Winston? -No, I wouldn't.
-Hello, Winston. -Say hello, Winston.
Hello, bubs.
-You look lovely. -Thank you.
Happy anniversary!
-Yes! -[Hilary] How's it been?
-Thirty-five years. -Long.
-Not as long as 35 years. -Not as long as 35 years. Indeed.
-[Hilary] So… -[Michael] Lovely.
The reason I've booked this beautiful five-star hotel
translation.zh: ‎我定这家漂亮的五星级酒店的原因是

translation.en: is because you're going to be here tonight having dinner, etc.
-Our wedding anniversary. -It is our wedding anniversary.
translation.zh:
‎-庆祝我们的纪念日
‎-是我们的纪念日

translation.en: But I'm afraid there's a little bit of a twist this year,
as there's an exciting camping experience I'd like Jack and I to do.
translation.zh:
‎我希望跟杰克一起
‎体验一下激动人心的露营

translation.en: And as I always took you kids camping,
translation.zh: ‎我过去总是带孩子们去露营

translation.en: I thought we could recreate a bit of that together on our last trip.
translation.zh:
‎我想我们可以
‎在这最后的旅行里再体验一次

translation.en: We're camping and he'll stay in the 5-star hotel?
translation.zh: ‎我们去露营 他住在五星级酒店里？

translation.en: -Yeah. -I think that's a pretty good setup.
Happy about that?
No.
Cockblock.
The only thing is you're not going to be alone, though,
because…
I don't think Winston should come camping.
The other thing I should just point out,
Michael…
I know you weren't allowed to get into Winston Churchill's bed/bath at Chartwell.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你们在查特韦尔庄园
‎不能上丘吉尔的床和进他的浴缸

translation.en: The big news is that Winston Churchill stayed here.
translation.zh: ‎好消息是 温斯顿丘吉尔住过这里

translation.en: There is a Winston Churchill suite.
Really?
So, we're going round the country,
so that I can get into baths and beds
translation.zh: ‎就为了钻进温斯顿丘吉尔用过的

translation.en: that have previously been occupied by Winston Churchill.
-Is that it? -That's the thought.
Fine, okay. Well, I'm going to celebrate my wedding anniversary on my own…
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我自己去庆祝结婚纪念日了

translation.en: -No! -…with a doll…
-That sounds worse. -…in Winston Churchill's bed.
translation.zh:
‎-听起来更糟了
‎-在温斯顿丘吉尔的床上

translation.en: Don't tell anyone in the hotel
that you'll be celebrating your wedding anniversary
in bed with a doll.
-They might get the wrong idea… -No, I won't.
translation.zh:
‎-这可能让他们误会…
‎-我不会说的

translation.en: …or possibly the right one.
We head to the island of Anglesey,
where Mommy reveals to me that we're not just going camping,
but cliff camping,
where you sleep off the side of a cliff.
translation.zh: ‎最后躺在悬崖断面的吊床上

translation.en: -Nah, not for me, this one. -[dramatic music playing]
Mommy and I will be spending the night high above the water and the rocks,
translation.zh: ‎我和老妈将在海水和岩石上的

translation.en: directly against the cliff face,
on that, a rickety stretcher dangling from a piece of string.
translation.zh:
‎就在这个靠一根绳子绑住的
‎摇摇晃晃的吊床上

translation.en: So, I think it's just up here.
Aha!
-Hello! -Hello!
-Hey. -I'm Sam.
-Hey, Sam. -I'm Hilary.
-Do you know what we're doing? -It looks quite terrifying.
translation.zh:
‎-你们知道今天要干吗吗？
‎-看起来很恐怖

translation.en: With the evening fast approaching,
it's time to get on our equipment and literally throw ourselves off a cliff.
translation.zh:
‎是时候穿上装备
‎在峭壁上飞檐走壁了

translation.en: [Jack] Oh God. It really is a cliff.
-Why don't you just bring that up here? -[Sam laughs]
translation.zh: ‎你为什么不把那个放在这里？

translation.en: I've got down to this bit and I'll lower my ass,
translation.zh: ‎我可以爬到这里 放低我的屁股

translation.en: and you just place it on my ass.
Then we're good to go.
-[Sam] That's it, Jack. -[grunts]
Oh, fuck.
Oh, what's that creaking?
Shut up, Hilary.
There's no creaking, Mother.
With me safely in position,
it was Hilary's turn to gracefully descend.
translation.zh: ‎现在轮到希拉里优雅地爬下来了

translation.en: -I've got to get over here, haven't I? -[Sam] Yeah, that's it.
translation.zh:
‎-我要踩在这里 对不对？
‎-对 就是那

translation.en: My mother, in a tightly-packed harness, being winched on top of me.
translation.zh: ‎我妈身缚紧身安全带 悬吊在我头顶

translation.en: Just cut my rope now!
Oh my God. I definitely should have gone second.
translation.zh: ‎上帝啊 我真不该先下来

translation.en: Jack!
Please don't make me laugh. I go all weak when I…
translation.zh: ‎别逗我笑 我会没力气的…

translation.en: I can't look down and I can't look up.
-[Sam] Hilary, keep yourself on-- -[Hilary] This side?
-[Sam] Yeah. -Step over this one.
-Yeah, alright. -No, you're behind it, Mommy.
translation.zh:
‎-知道了
‎-不 上面一点 老妈

translation.en: -I know I am. -You're too low.
-Get over there. -Don't make me laugh.
Put your weight on there, Hilary.
translation.zh: ‎把重量放那边去 希拉里

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -Lower.
Lower.
-Okay? -I've got hysterical, sorry.
translation.zh:
‎-好了吗？
‎-我有点歇斯底里 抱歉

translation.en: [Jack] No…
-[Sam] Why don't you turn around? -[Hilary] Oh, yes, I will.
Maybe one at a time. Slow, steady movements.
translation.zh: ‎一个一个来 慢慢地 不要大幅动作

translation.en: Right, I'm definitely going first this time…
translation.zh: ‎这次我绝对要先来 因为你…

translation.en: Went first… Why are you going first?
I'm just getting it over and done with.
Ooh, fucking hell. Please don't do that.
-[yells] Oh, fuck. -Jack, what are you doing? I'm trying to get round.
How's it going there, Jack?
-Yeah. -Yeah? Good?
-I mean, the view is spectacular. -I'm really not that into this.
translation.zh:
‎-这个景色太壮观了
‎-我并没有很想看

translation.en: I'm loving this, Jack.
Where's your spirit of adventure?
I left it at the top of the cliff.
You're sounding, can I just say,
translation.zh: ‎允许我说一句 你现在听起来

translation.en: like the son of your father.
-[waiter] Mr. Whitehall, how are we? -Very well, thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-怀特豪尔先生 你好吗？
‎-非常好 谢谢

translation.en: -Can I pour your tea for you? -Thank you.
-And would he like some? -Definitely.
You'd like tea, wouldn't you, Winston,
translation.zh: ‎你要喝茶的 对不对 温斯顿？

translation.en: with Daddy?
[Hilary] So, the final adventure.
[Jack] It might be if we never make it off this platform.
translation.zh: ‎有可能 如果我们没办法从这里回去

translation.en: I don't mean this moment. I mean the whole journey with your dad.
translation.zh:
‎我说的不是这一刻
‎而是你跟你爸的整个旅程

translation.en: How's it been?
-Yeah, it's been lovely. -Yeah?
It's been very nice to be back on the road with him.
translation.zh: ‎能跟他再次踏上旅途真的很棒

translation.en: I didn't think we'd be back on the road again,
translation.zh: ‎我本来以为我没办法再跟他旅游了

translation.en: but I'm very thankful
that we are back,
traveling together.
Obviously, it's been a very, very weird year.
-It was also scary. -It was scary.
Scary not seeing you and also just not knowing…
translation.zh: ‎看不到你很可怕 未知也让人畏惧

translation.en: Yeah.
With Molly being pregnant as well and all of that going on at the same time…
translation.zh:
‎而且莫莉怀孕了
‎同时又发生了那么多事…

translation.en: Like, the relief when she gave birth
and she sent me those pictures of you and Daddy with Peggy,
translation.zh:
‎她还给我发了
‎你和老爸还有佩吉的照片

translation.en: [voice breaks] and I was just so thankful and so happy, and seeing Daddy holding her…
translation.zh:
‎我真的很感激 很开心
‎看到老爸抱着她…

translation.en: -I know. -And I was, like…
I was so happy that we got to that moment
translation.zh: ‎我真的很高兴我们走到了那一步

translation.en: and he got through it, and you got through it,
and you were with your granddaughter and seeing how happy you both were…
translation.zh:
‎你们跟孙女在一起
‎看到你们俩高高兴兴的…

translation.en: It was just, like… Just a relief.
I shall never take it for granted,
translation.zh: ‎这一切从来都不是理所当然

translation.en: getting to hang out with you and Daddy,
even if it is over a cliff.
You know, we've had time to think during the last year
translation.zh:
‎是的 去年那段时间
‎我们得以认真思考了一下

translation.en: and we've had a major decision.
-I'm sure your father has told you. -No.
translation.zh:
‎-我相信你老爸已经告诉你了
‎-没有

translation.en: This is so classic of your father.
I gave him one job to do.
-You're putting Winston up for adoption? -No.
translation.zh:
‎-你要把温斯顿托养给别人？
‎-不是

translation.en: -Because I would be fully supportive. -I know you would be.
translation.zh:
‎-我举双手双脚支持
‎-我知道你会

translation.en: -I'd drive him to the orphanage. -[sighs]
There may be a bit of mileage being put between you and Winston
translation.zh: ‎你跟温斯顿或许是有点距离

translation.en: because your father and I have decided we're going to move out of London.
translation.zh: ‎因为你爸和我已经决定搬出伦敦

translation.en: -You're moving out of London? -Yeah.
-Nah. -Yeah.
Because you now are settled with your girlfriend,
translation.zh: ‎因为你已经跟女友安定下来了

translation.en: Molly and Toby have had Peggy, so we're now grandparents,
translation.zh:
‎莫莉和托比也有了佩吉
‎我们成了祖父母

translation.en: and we just feel that we need to change it up a bit.
translation.zh: ‎我们觉得我们需要做些改变

translation.en: I can't believe Daddy didn't tell you all this.
translation.zh: ‎难以置信 你爸居然没告诉你

translation.en: -No. -He hasn't mentioned it at all?
No, he's mainly been making dodgy comments about the Welsh.
translation.zh:
‎没有啊
‎他一直在喋喋不休地讲威尔士

translation.en: [whispering] Fuck!
You've got Daddy over a barrel here, Winston, and you know it.
translation.zh:
‎你把爸爸逼入了困境
‎温斯顿 你说是不是？

translation.en: What I have done, though, Jack, to celebrate this moment,
translation.zh: ‎杰克 我为了庆祝这个时刻

translation.en: is I've prepared some supper.
-[Sam] Here it comes. You ready? -Yep! Thank you very, very much.
translation.zh:
‎-东西来了 准备好了吗？
‎-好了 非常感谢

translation.en: Just remember, anything you drop is probably not coming back.
translation.zh:
‎记住 如果有东西掉下去
‎恐怕是回不来的

translation.en: Yeah, got it.
[Sam] What have you got?
I've got some Chinese from Gordon Ramsay's restaurant, the Lucky Cat.
translation.zh:
‎我准备了从戈登拉姆齐的
‎餐厅幸运猫带来的中餐

translation.en: -Yeah. -Are you joking?
-Yeah, no, I have. -From a week ago?
-Here, look. -I'm not eating that!
-Look. -What, all that stuff?
-It's lovely, look. -[coughs]
That's disgusting.
I'm not having some old flabby gyoza that's been in the fridge for a week.
translation.zh:
‎我才不要吃在冰箱里放了一周的
‎软塌塌的隔夜饺子

translation.en: Just try one.
-Just try it. -It's all cold and flabby.
translation.zh:
‎-试试
‎-都冷了 还软绵绵的

translation.en: It looks like one of Daddy's testicles.
-That is so mean! -What?
-On the food or his testicles? -Daddy's testicles. It's so mean.
translation.zh:
‎-食物还是蛋蛋？
‎-当然是蛋蛋 你太刻薄了

translation.en: What the fuck is that?
-Do you remember that lovely fish you did? -The road-killed fish?
translation.zh:
‎-你还记得那条鱼吗？
‎-在马路上被撞死的鱼？

translation.en: -You've brought it with you to Wales? -Yep.
-Look. -It's a week old. Fuck!
I'm actually gagging.
-You're a monster. -That's a bit fruity, even for me.
translation.zh:
‎-你这个怪物
‎-在我看来都有点恶心了

translation.en: [Jack] I think I'm about to chunder onto a puffin.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我要吐到海鹦身上了

translation.en: It's time for me to take control of this final trip.
translation.zh: ‎是时候到我掌控这场最后的旅行了

translation.en: We need to do some things we'll regret, whether Daddy likes it or not.
translation.zh:
‎我们要做些大胆的事
‎不论老爸喜不喜欢

translation.en: Please, no, Max! [yelps]
[man] Let go of…
Jack, can you just fuck off? Because you're just causing havoc.
translation.zh: ‎杰克 你能滚开吗？你在制造混乱

translation.en: Do you want a little cuddle?
-No! Move it away! -Ow, Daddy!
Look, fuck off!
You're a cheat.
-I'm not a cheat. -You are, you're a cheat!
